name: Lunar Stars

weaponEffects.title: Altered Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase ATK by **30%** and altered resistance by **60%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more altered weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. Does not stack with Altered Reaction as Altered Resonance will take priority.

advancements: Use any weapon skill or discharge to gain **1** elemental crystal, up to **5** stacks, which decay after **6** seconds. Elemental crystals increase your final damage by **4%** * (**crystal count** + **1**) / **2**, and healing by **6%** * (**crystal count** + **1**) / **2**.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

While not using Benediction Resonance and the target's health is lower than (**crystal count** + **2**)**%**, **Lunar Stars** can instantly kill the enemy (ineffective against players).

When using Benediction Resonance and the target's health is lower than (**crystal count** * **2** + **2**)**%**, **Lunar Stars** can instantly kill the enemy (ineffective against players).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

Gain **1** elemental crystal every time you use Scattering Technique. The decay time for an elemental crystal is increased to **20** seconds.

Upon taking lethal damage, consume **3** elemental crystals to neutralize the damage and temporarily become invincible, cooldown **25** seconds.

abilities.name: Frost
abilities.description: While on the ground, use Lunar Stars to launch 7 consecutive attacks.

abilities.name: Dew Dance
abilities.description: While airborne, use normal attack to attack 7 times in a row in mid-air and consume endurance.

abilities.name: Condensation Ripple
abilities.description:
While on the ground, tap and hold the basic attack button between the second and sixth basic attacks to trigger Condensation Ripple.

Rise into the air, and continuously launch water bullets at enemies, consuming endurance. Each hit deals **150%** of ATK + **8** (considered damage from a charged attack) and stagger enemies.

abilities.name: Moondrop
abilities.description: Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is selected), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using Jetpack to trigger Moondrop. Fall from the sky and deal **175%** of ATK + **9** and suspend targets upon landing.

abilities.name: Crashing Springs
abilities.description:
While airborne, tap and hold the basic attack button between the second and sixth basic attacks to trigger Condensation Ripple.

Rise into the air, and continuously launch water bullets at enemies, consuming endurance. Each hit deals **150%** of ATK + **8** (considered damage from a charged attack) and stagger enemies.

abilities.name: Share
abilities.description:
When using the **Benediction Resonance**:

While on the ground, press and hold basic attack to select a teammate and release to form a link with them. The linked target cannot be linked again until the link is broken by them reaching 0 HP, linking to a new target, or exceeding the max link distance. The linked target receives **50%** more healing from Lunar Stars.

If the linked teammate is using **Fortitude Resonance**, they gain resistance equal to **50%** of your resistance.

If the linked teammate is using **Balanced Resonance** or **Attack Resonance**, they gain ATK equal to **20%** of your ATK (up to **20000**).

If the linked teammate is using **Benediction Resonance**, increase both of your healing by an additional **30%**.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger a Phantasia, cooldown 15 seconds, reducing the speed of enemies within an area. Become immune to hitstun for **0.5** seconds while dodging.

**Passive:** Restore HP equal to **200%** of ATK to yourself and nearby allies, and clear **8** points of ash value. When using **Benediction Resonance**, gain **50** Weapon charge.

abilities.name: Swift Step
abilities.description: Swiftly dash around forward and back to deal **160%** of ATK + **8** damage to targets in range.

abilities.name: Geyser Swing
abilities.description: Release an erupting geyser, dealing **90%** of ATK + **5** damage and **suspending** enemies.

abilities.name: Cascade
abilities.description:
Release a tidal eruption, dealing up to **680%** of ATK + **36** damage to targets in range and **strongly suspending** them. Cooldown **30** seconds.

**Passive: Dissipate**

When equipped with **Lunar Stars**, you can equip up to **2** of the **6** Dissipate skills in the Skill List -> Settings screen.

To use: When at least one Dissipate skill is equipped, its passive effect will automatically be applied alongside Cascade, and Cascade's cooldown will be replaced with the cooldown of the selected Dissipate skill. If a second Dissipate skill is equipped, it will be given a separate skill button.

abilities.name: Welling
abilities.description:
Cause a surging tide, dealing up to **1,500%** of ATK + **79** damage to nearby targets. Increase all elemental damage by **10%** for **20** seconds.

Cooldown: **14** seconds.

abilities.name: Surge
abilities.description:
Summon multiple water spouts, pulling in nearby targets and dealing up to **1,800%** of ATK + **95** damage. Form a large tornado after a short time, dealing **800%** of ATK + **42** damage to nearby targets.

Damage from **Surge** is considered as damage from a discharge skill.

Cooldown: **12** seconds.

abilities.name: Wave Pressure
abilities.description:
Bathe in the torrent, gaining **60** weapon charge per second and increasing skill and discharge damage by **20%** for **35** seconds.

Using **Wave Pressure** is considered as using the current weapon's discharge (no effect). **Aqua Brilliance** refreshes **Wave Pressure's** cooldown.

Cooldown: **30** seconds.

abilities.name: Vortex
abilities.description:
Surrounded by waves, your final damage gradually increases to **32%** over **10** seconds. Effect does not stack and is lost after switching weapons.

Cooldown: **30** seconds.

abilities.name: Shackle
abilities.description:
Trap the target in a water cage for **3** seconds, during which they cannot move or use skills. Reduces the trapped target's resistance by **8%** within **15** seconds (ineffective against players). When the Wanderer dives into the sea, the **Shackle**'s resistance reduction is doubled.

Cooldown: **15** seconds.

abilities.name: Nourishing Spring
abilities.description:
Increase all elemental damage by (**Max HP** / **115000**)%, up to **30%**. If your Max HP is greater than **2600000**, increase all elemental damage by **25%** for **20** seconds.

Cooldown: **15** seconds.

abilities.name: Aqua Brilliance
abilities.description:
When ***weapon charge is full*** or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, switching to this weapon **removes all debuffs from the wielder** and causes Lunar Stars to deal up to **1,500%** of ATK + **79** damage to nearby targets, with invincibility for **2.6** seconds during the animation (unavailable in Apex League). Restore **400%** of ATK as HP, clear **16** points of ash value, remove delay effect and be immune to delay for **5** seconds.

**Passive: Lunar Stars**

When using **Balanced Resonance** or **Attack Resonance**, a successful hit with **Aqua Brilliance** will increase your ATK by **20%** for **30** seconds.

When using **Fortitude Resonance**, every time you use **Aqua Brilliance**, increase resistance by **8%** for **30** seconds, up to **5** stacks. If your HP falls below **30%**, receive an additional **80%** damage reduction for **5** seconds, which can be triggered up to once within **60** seconds.

When using **Benediction Resonance**, **Aqua Brilliance** grants **1** use of Lunar Stars' Protection to all teammates (cannot stack), which lasts **10** seconds and can block damage **1** time. Each use of **Aqua Brilliance** will increase the healing effect of the subsequent uses by **20%**, up to **40%** and subsist for **30** seconds.
